member.name: T:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DotvvmEnforceClientFormatAttribute
member.summary: Checks whether the value matches the format specified by DotVVM control (e.g. TextBox). The value can be empty string or null. If it is not, it must match the FormatString that the control specifies.

member.summary: Specifies the binding direction.

member.summary: Gets the binding direction.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Framework.ViewModel.BindAttribute.Name
member.summary: Name of the property in JSON and JS viewModel

member.name: M:DotVVM.Framework.ViewModel.BindAttribute.#ctor(DotVVM.Framework.ViewModel.Direction)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:DotVVM.Framework.ViewModel.Direction
member.summary: ServerToClient, ServerToClient on postback, ClientToServer, C2S iff in command path

member.name: T:DotVVM.Framework.ViewModel.ProtectAttribute
member.summary: Defines the protection mode of the property in ViewModel.

member.name: T:DotVVM.Framework.ViewModel.ProtectMode
member.summary: An enumeration of possible view model data protection modes.

member.name: F:DotVVM.Framework.ViewModel.ProtectMode.None
member.summary: The property value is sent to the client unencrypted and it is not signed. It can be modified on the client with no restrictions.

member.name: F:DotVVM.Framework.ViewModel.ProtectMode.SignData
member.summary: The property value is sent to the client unencrypted, but it is also signed. If it is modified on the client, the server will throw an exception during postback.

member.name: F:DotVVM.Framework.ViewModel.ProtectMode.EncryptData
member.summary: The property value is encrypted before it is sent to the client.
